description: HTML source code for a database viewer web application interface, including styles and client-side JavaScript for data fetching and display.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays list of databases in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes database list and resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data in a tabular format in the DOM.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates individual cell contents, handling object expansion and truncation.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data.
